page.title: 14A Walk To Harley
page.content: It was a warm sunny{morning}as we set off to{walk}to{Harley.}We had caught the{bus}to{Wentworth}and now we were going to do the rest on{foot.}We turned left past the{village school and walked down{Churchfield Lane.}It was a very quiet lane that cars didn't {normally}use. Hedges lined the lane on each side and over the hedges we could see fields of{wheat.}There was also a field full of{peas.}After a while we passed{Ashes Farm}and there were cows out in the field. We were going down quite a steep hill now towards{Oak {Tree Cottage.}The cottage has been modernised and it looked very pretty. Now the lane turned right to{Harley We passed a field where they were cutting{hay}and there was a strong sweet smell.Trees grew on either side of the lane as we at last reached Harley. We all needed a rest now.
